Changelog
=========

0.2.1 (2012-12-13)
------------------

- Added a MANIFES file [keul]

0.2 (2012-12-12)
----------------

- added log messages when patches are used [keul]
- added support for substitution of new style ``icon_expr``
  with old-style ``content_icon`` [keul]

0.1 (2012-12-12)
----------------

- Initial release
